dict.acceptation: 适合，适宜；相称，相当；变成；发生；

sent.orig: You become a prisoner in a sense when you become addicted to any substance, including caffeine.
sent.trans: 当你对什么东西上瘾时，包括咖啡因在内，从某种意义上来说，你就已成了它的阶下囚。

sent.orig: The trickle become a stream; the stream has now become a torrent.
sent.trans: 涓涓细流汇成了小溪，小溪现在已变成了奔腾的江河。

sent.orig: Do not become the new round money transaction the carrier to become.
sent.trans: 别成为新一轮的权钱交易的载体就成了。

sent.orig: These three traits are interrelated and have become more necessary as fields have become increasingly specialized.
sent.trans: 这三种特点是相关的，而当各个领域变得越来越专业化的时候，它们也显得更有必要。

sent.orig: Habitat destruction makes many species of animals become homeless and become endangered.
sent.trans: 栖息地的破坏使许多动物无家可归，成为濒危物种。
